Text: Complete the requirements gathering for CGS Cc PST This meeting is to review the email bullet points and determine what the interface will entail Our goal is to have a document for signature by the end of the week Thank you Monica Clay x

Consolidated Gas System Cc PST This meeting is to determine what types of reports will be needed and where the shortcomings are for the existing reporting system We would also like to find out what type of security will be needed Monica

Updated Warning Window for the Tagg Deal Entry Cc PST The location is EB Thank you This is a new day and time for this meeting Thank you and I apologize for any inconvenience Background A request was received by the Gas Tactical group that would have implications on the system you use The request was to have the existing warning window appear if the trader enters a date that is before the date of the trade Knowing that there are times where trades can be back dated we cannot restrict this but to have the trader see a warning window appear to make them double check their dates if they are for a previous date would be beneficial to the requestor If they know the date is correct they would have the option to continue with the terms Often times due to human error Book Admins see mistakes made where the trade date is and the terms are to Because we are in the middle of the month a red flag is being raised with the Book Admins to question this trade Often times it is found that it was a mistake To date the system will only show a warning window if the trade terms were for to Request Review Is it possible to allow the existing warning window to display for a date that is before the trade date even a day before and not just for a different month Thank you in advance Monica Clay x

Updated Gas Daily Settlement Prices Cc PST The meeting will be held in Conference Room ACC in the Allen Center There are no rooms available in this building I will see you all there Monica I am Monica Clay a new Business Analyst in the Gas Tactical group One of my first tasks has been to cut down on IT handling of data We have gone over the process for getting data into the ERMS database and there have been times that IT has move data around after changes or inserts have beeen made To prevent this we would like to introduce an addition to the process to keep all data in the Business Units hands We would like your input on the small change to the process and the pubpostings screen that is used often by many Please contact me if you have any questions or comments Thank you in advance Monica x

Development Stage of CGS Cc PST We are beginning the development stage of our Consolidated Gas System Reporting project and we need to get more detailed information about the location of data that is being pulled in WeaponX presently The majority of the reports we have been able to locate in ERMS but there are a couple where the data has not been found We need to map the present location of the data to ensure all information will be in the new system We would also like to go through a calc stepbystep to ensure all necessary pieces will be included in the new system We are requesting one representative from Risk Management be present to answer a few questions A data architect and a developer will be present to ask necessary questions to get off to a good start Please let me know who will be available from the Risk side Thank you

Consolidated Gas System ReportingPST Kam I am asking that we spend minutes going over the questions that I sent out Friday I kept the same time since we had a room for that time slot but I know you guys have been really busy with the move so let me know if there is another time that would be better for you Monica Clay x

RE Todays Meeting LocationI am not sure what happened with the update I sent outit seemed to have cancelled it in some peoples calendars If you are still able to make it please come by It will be for no more than minutes Today at in room EBc Thank you and I do apologize for the inconvenience Original Message From Clay Monica Sent Monday October AM To Keiser Kam McLaughlin Jr Errol Gossett Jeffrey C Winfree ONeal D Love Phillip M Baumbach David Best Kristine Husain Karima Subject Todays Meeting Location Our meeting today to adress a change in the warning screen that pops up when an incorrect date is entered by a trader will be held in EBC from until pm Thank you Monica Clay Enron Net Works LLC Smith Street Houston Texas ENRON

Todays Meeting LocationOur meeting today to adress a change in the warning screen that pops up when an incorrect date is entered by a trader will be held in EBC from until pm Thank you Monica Clay Enron Net Works LLC Smith Street Houston Texas ENRON

Meeting today from to Cc Please let me know if a representative from the Risk Management group will be able to meet with the development team today from to am in ECS Below is a description of the meeting contained in the invite Invite Note We are beginning the development stage of our Consolidated Gas System Reporting project and we need to get more detailed information about the location of data that is being pulled in WeaponX presently The majority of the reports we have been able to locate in ERMS but there are a couple where the data has not been found We need to map the present location of the data to ensure all information will be in the new system We would also like to go through a calc stepbystep to ensure all necessary pieces will be included in the new system We are requesting one representative from Risk Management be present to answer a few questions A data architect and a developer will be present to ask necessary questions to get off to a good start Please let me know who will be available from the Risk side Thank you Monica Clay Enron Net Works LLC Smith Street Houston Texas ENRON

Development Stage of CGS Cc When Tuesday November AM AM GMT Central Time US Canada Where ECS We are beginning the development stage of our Consolidated Gas System Reporting project and we need to get more detailed information about the location of data that is being pulled in WeaponX presently The majority of the reports we have been able to locate in ERMS but there are a couple where the data has not been found We need to map the present location of the data to ensure all information will be in the new system We would also like to go through a calc stepbystep to ensure all necessary pieces will be included in the new system We are requesting one representative from Risk Management be present to answer a few questions A data architect and a developer will be present to ask necessary questions to get off to a good start Please let me know who will be available from the Risk side Thank you

Warning Window for the Tagg Deal Entry Cc When Thursday November PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where TBD This is a new day and time for this meeting Thank you and I apologize for any inconvenience Background A request was received by the Gas Tactical group that would have implications on the system you use The request was to have the existing warning window appear if the trader enters a date that is before the date of the trade Knowing that there are times where trades can be back dated we cannot restrict this but to have the trader see a warning window appear to make them double check their dates if they are for a previous date would be beneficial to the requestor If they know the date is correct they would have the option to continue with the terms Often times due to human error Book Admins see mistakes made where the trade date is and the terms are to Because we are in the middle of the month a red flag is being raised with the Book Admins to question this trade Often times it is found that it was a mistake To date the system will only show a warning window if the trade terms were for to Request Review Is it possible to allow the existing warning window to display for a date that is before the trade date even a day before and not just for a different month Thank you in advance Monica Clay x

Warning Screen Change Cc PST After our meeting today the change has been approved and will be put into production no earlier than November and no later than November Again this change will in no way restrict trading activity Its function is to limit the number of unintentional errors when entering a trade due to back dating a trade The warning screen that exists will now appear when a date is entered on a deal that is prior to todays date Thank you for your assistance Please call with any questions Monica Clay Enron Net Works LLC Smith Street Houston Texas ENRON

Consolidated Gas SystemSOW Cc To begin the Inception phase of our CGS project the Statement of Work is near completion I am sending the final version to the project team to include the business unit sponsors In a couple of days our goal is to have a meeting to discuss any issues and sign off on the document Please contact me with any questions Thank you Monica Clay Enron Net Works LLC Smith Street Houston Texas ENRON

Sign off on the Consolidated Gas System projectWhen Tuesday November AM AM GMT Central Time US Canada Where TBD I have sent the SOW in a previous email I am asking that we meet to go over the document and get physical signatures Thank you
